General.Name: SeA Mechanics Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SeA Mechanics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive and electronic parts in South Korea and internationally. The company offers secondary batteries, including battery module parts, battery-pack support parts, and end covers and plats; electric automotive parts, such as control unit brackets, coolant parts, DC Boxes, front end covers, and rear brackets; cover heat sinks and heat sinks for electric two-wheel vehicles; and hydrogen automotive parts that comprise actuator and anti-vibration parts, such as ACV valve, APC pipe, and APC valve housing products. It also provides display devices, such as wall mount brackets; digital signage unit frames; and driving mechanism products. The company was formerly known as SeA Industrial Company and changed its name to SeA Mechanics Co., Ltd. in July 2002. SeA Mechanics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Gumi, South Korea.
